headline: Assurant Lands on Newsweek’s America’s Most Responsible Companies List for the Second Consecutive Year
summary: ATLANTA, December 04, 2024--Assurant, Inc. (NYSE: AIZ), a leading global business services company that supports, protects, and connects major consumer purchases, has been included in Newsweek’s list of America’s Most Responsible Companies 2025. This prestigious award is presented in collaboration with Statista, the world-leading statistics portal and industry ranking provider. The awards list can be viewed on Newsweek’s website.
